page.title: 13Leisure
page.content: The number of{men}we looked at in our leisure survey was 28.The most popular{hobbies}were gardening,bike riding,walking and reading.Other hobbies included D.I.Y., photography and board games. Most men from our sample watched football, cricket and motor racing. Show jumping,snooker and swimming were also watched. Sports played were cricket,bowls, fishing, karate and judo.The{clubs}men go to are the cricket club and the working men's club.The total number of{women we looked at in our survey was 28.The most popular{hobbies}were reading, sewing, gardening, listening to tapes and records. Other hobbies women do include writing letters, cooking, voluntary work and puzzles.Most women watched tennis and ice skating. The women's favourite{sport}was swimming.
